member.name: M:Tilety.Core.Extensions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes/uppercases the first letter of the specified string.

member.name: T:Tilety.Core.TmxMap
member.summary: Defines a Tiled map file (.tmx) resource to be used with Duality.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.Orientation
member.summary: Map orientation. Tiled supports "orthogonal", "isometric" and "staggered" (since 0.9) at the moment.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.BackgroundColor
member.summary: The background color of the map.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.RenderOrder
member.summary: The order in which tiles on tile layers are rendered. Valid values are right-down (the default), right-up, left-down and left-up.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.LayerFormat
member.summary: The encoding used to encode the tile layer data.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.Properties
member.summary: Wraps any number of custom properties. Can be used as a child of the map, tile (when part of a tileset), layer, objectgroup and object elements.

member.name: M:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.LoadMapData(System.String)
member.summary: Load map data into a map resource file.
